mapper.insert: insert into user_info(user_key, user_id, user_pw, user_name, email, phone, birthday, regDate, address, gender, account_num ,building_registration) values (#{userKey}, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birthday}, now() ,#{userAddress}, #{gender}, #{userAccount} ,#{BuildingRegistration})
